summary: Diff adds a single-page Softevia landing page with header/footer, key marketing sections, a lead-capture modal+form wired to a Motoko backend submit method, and basic SEO tags. However, backend lead persistence/sanity checks and required static image set (including dashboard mockup and capability icons) are not fully evidenced as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store lead submissions in stable, upgrade-safe state; perform basic input sanity checks; expose an update method used by the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend stores leads in a non-stable in-memory List with no stable-memory pattern shown, and no server-side validation/sanity checks or max-length constraints are present in the shown code.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add and render required static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, including at least one dashboard UI mockup and the 6 capability icons, with proper alt text and responsive display.
missing_requirements.reason: Only the hero illustration is referenced in the page code; there is no evidence of rendering the dashboard mockup image or the required capability icon image set, and the actual asset files under frontend/public/assets/generated are not shown in the diff summary (two added files are omitted).

hallucinated_features.description: Backend method to retrieve all leads (getAllLeads), which resembles an admin/CRM-style data access endpoint.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a method for the frontend to submit leads; it explicitly calls out admin CRM UI as a non-goal, and does not request a lead export/listing method.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon ('Built with love using caffeine.ai').
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the landing page requirements and adds unrelated branding/attribution content.
